pageContext.title: Dog Wired (w/8 Wired)
pageContext.description: Brewed in collaboration with Soren from New Zealand’s stellar 8-Wired brewery, this is an Imperial Pilsner featuring two of our favourite New Zealand hops: Nelson Sauvin and Motueka. Sitting at a dangerously drinkable 7.1% ABV there’s a touch of Munich malt which gives this beer that little extra caramel biscuit bite to compliment the lip smackingly tropical hops. Expect an all out NZ hoppy riot.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
